content:
Above is a list of intents and slots associated with those intents. After the instructions there is an utterance.
Read the text very attentively and assign the best intent that it matches from the list above. 
All intents are provided in json format. Each intent has its Intent Id in an alphanumeric format, intent name and description. Each slot has slot Id, slot.name and slot description, and data type.
It may also include a field of possible.values which means the slot must match one of the provided values. It could also include a field example.Values where examples are given but the extracted slots do not need to exactly match those given values. 
I want you to give your final output as a JSON. The JSON should always have a key “output”. 
If you can identify the intent for the given utterance, The value of “output” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a subdictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values.
If there are no matching intents for the utterance, respond as {"intents":[{"id":"none", "entities":[]}]}

__utterance__

This scanner should be replaced immediately! The quality of the scanned documents is absolutely unacceptable. The documents manifest streaks and smudges across the images, affecting their clarity and legibility.
